description: This is a header file defining the CMHAL class, which provides an interface for device management functions related to Cable Modem hardware abstraction layer (HAL). It includes class declarations, method signatures for JSON-RPC handlers, and method bindings for RPC server integration.

classes.name: CMHAL
classes.description: A class providing JSON-RPC handler functions for device configuration and control of Cable Modem hardware. It inherits from RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer, binding various device control methods to RPC procedures.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetParamCharValue
methods.description: Handler to retrieve character parameter values from the device.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Handler to retrieve unsigned long parameter values.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetErrorCodeWords
methods.description: Handler to obtain error code words.

methods.name: CMHAL_Init
methods.description: Initialization handler for the device.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetDocsisEventLogItems
methods.description: Handler to retrieve DOCSIS event log items.

methods.name: CMHAL_SetLEDFlashStatus
methods.description: Handler to control LED flashing status.

methods.name: CMHAL_ClearDocsisEventLog
methods.description: Handler to clear DOCSIS event log.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetCPEList
methods.description: Handler to get the list of CPE devices.

methods.name: CMHAL_SetMddIpModeOverride
methods.description: Handler to override MDD IP mode settings.

methods.name: CMHAL_SetStartFreq
methods.description: Handler to set the starting frequency.

methods.name: CMHAL_SetUSChannelId
methods.description: Handler to set upstream channel ID.

methods.name: CMHAL_SetHTTP_Download_Interface
methods.description: Handler to set the network interface for HTTP download.

methods.name: CMHAL_HTTP_Download
methods.description: Handler to initiate an HTTP download.

methods.name: CMHAL_Reboot_Now
methods.description: Handler to reboot the device immediately.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetHTTP_Download_Url
methods.description: Handler to retrieve the current download URL.

methods.name: CMHAL_SetHTTP_Download_Url
methods.description: Handler to set the download URL and filename.

methods.name: CMHAL_FWupdateAndFactoryReset
methods.description: Handler to perform firmware update and factory reset.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetDsOfdmChanTable
methods.description: Handler to get downstream OFDM channel table.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetUsOfdmChanTable
methods.description: Handler to get upstream OFDM channel table.

methods.name: CMHAL_GetStatusOfdmaUsTable
methods.description: Handler to get OFDMA US table status.

methods.name: CMHAL_IsEnergyDetected
methods.description: Handler to check energy detection status.

methods.name: CMHAL(TcpSocketServer & ptrRpcServer)
methods.description: unavailable
